definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_set_nogravity"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="gravityValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_particle"><field name="particle">FIREWORKS_SPARK</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="xs"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value><value name="ys"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value><value name="zs"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">80</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
